member.name: P:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadlParam.Repeating

member.name: P:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadlParam.Required
member.summary: Optionally indicates whether the parameter is required (true) or optional (false)

member.name: P:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadlParam.Path

member.name: P:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadlParam.Fixed
member.summary: Optionally provides a fixed value for the parameter element

member.name: P:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadlOption.MediaType
member.summary: When present this indicates that the parent parameter acts as a media type selector for responses. The value of the attribute is the media type that is expected when the parameter has the value given in the value attribute.

member.name: T:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadlElementType

member.name: T:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType
member.summary: Defines DICOM WADO-RS, QIDO-RS, STOW-RS, WADO-WS and UPS-RS action types.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RsCapabilitiesRetrieve
member.summary: Retrieves the full WADL resource tree from the WADO Retrieve RESTful resource endpoints

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RsCapabilitiesSearch
member.summary: Retrieves the full WADL resource tree from the QIDO Search RESTful resource endpoints

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RsCapabilitiesStore
member.summary: Retrieves the full WADL resource tree from the STOW Store RESTful resource endpoints

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RsCapabilitiesSubscribe
member.summary: Retrieves the full WADL resource tree from the Subscribe RESTful resource endpoints

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RsCapabilitiesUpdate
member.summary: Retrieves the full WADL resource tree from the Update RESTful resource endpoints

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.ChangeUPSState
member.summary: This action sets the state of a UPS Instance managed by the Origin-Server. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-ACTION operation "Change UPS State".

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.CreateSubscription
member.summary: This action subscribes to a UPS Instance or the Global Worklist managed by the Origin-Server. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-ACTION operation "Subscribe to Receive UPS Event Reports".

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.CreateUPS
member.summary: This action requests the creation of a UPS Instance on the Origin-Server. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-CREATE operation.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.DeleteSubscription
member.summary: This action cancels an existing subscription to a UPS Instance or the Global Worklist managed by the Origin-Server. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-ACTION operation "Unsubscribe from Receiving UPS Event Reports".

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.OpenEventChannel
member.summary: This action initiates a WebSocket connection to allow the User-Agent to start receiving Event Report messages.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RequestUPSCancellation
member.summary: This action requests the cancellation of a UPS Instance managed by the Origin-Server. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-ACTION operation "Request UPS Cancel".

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveImagingDocumentSet
member.summary: This action retrieves a set of DICOM instances and other objects. This action corresponds to the IHE XDS-I.b transaction RAD-69. The DICOM instances are formatted in accordance with PS3.10, and encapsulated in a Web Services response.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveRenderedImagingDocumentSet
member.summary: This action retrieves a set of DICOM instances that have been rendered into the requested format. For example, if rendering into JPEG was requested, these will be the JPEG renderings of the requested set of DICOM objects.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveImagingDocumentSetInformation
member.summary: This action retrieves a set of DICOM instances presented as an Infoset with the bulk data removed. This service can retrieve either the full metadata, or a subset selected by XPath arguments. The XML encoding for the DICOM attributes is defined in PS3.19.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveStudy
member.summary: This action retrieves every instance for the specified Study UID. All response formats have a content type of multipart/related with a message boundary separator. The response format depends on the Accept header specified in the request.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveSeries
member.summary: This action retrieves the document(s) for the specified Study UID and Series Instance UID. If the data cannot be converted to any of the requested media types/Transfer Syntaxes, then an error code shall be returned, either a "Not Acceptable" response if no data is returned or a "Partial Content" response if only some data is returned. All response formats have a content type of multipart/related with a message boundary separator. The response format depends on the Accept header specified in the request.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveInstance
member.summary: This action retrieves a single object for the specified SOP Instance UID or one or more bulk data items. In order to parse the bulk data items it is necessary to also retrieve the metadata for the Study. If the data cannot be converted to any of the requested media types, then an error code shall be returned, either a "Not Acceptable" response if no data is returned or a "Partial Content" response if only some data is returned. All response formats have a content type of multipart/related with a message boundary separator. The response format depends on the Accept header specified in the request.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveFrames
member.summary: This action retrieves the document(s) indicated in the request. In order to parse the bulk data items it is necessary to also retrieve the metadata for the Study. If the server cannot encode the pixel data using any of the requested media types, then an error status shall be returned. All response formats have a content type of multipart/related with a message boundary separator.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveBulkdata
member.summary: This action retrieves the document(s) indicated in the request. In order to parse the bulk data items it is necessary to also retrieve the metadata for the Study. If the server cannot encode the data using any of the requested media types, then an error status shall be returned. All response formats have a content type of multipart/related with a message boundary separator. The response format depends on the Accept header specified in the request.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveMetadata
member.summary: This action retrieves the DICOM instances presented as the full study metadata with the bulk data removed. The response is metadata for the DICOM attributes. The full study metadata includes all attributes of the study; however, is permitted to replace the Value Field of an attribute with a BulkDataURI for attributes with Value Representations (VR) of FL, FD, IS, LT, OB, OD, OF, OW, OL, SL, SS, ST, UL, UN, US, and UT. The client can use the BulkDataURI with the RetrieveBulkData action to retrieve the original Value Field of that attribute.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveRendered
member.summary: This action retrieves the Rendered resource which references a rendered Study, Series, Instance or Frame within instance. in acceptable Rendered Media Type

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveThumbnail
member.summary: This action retrieves the the Thumbnail resource which references a thumbnail image of a Study, Series, Instance or Frame within instance.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.RetrieveUPS
member.summary: This action retrieves a UPS Instances. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-GET operation.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.SearchForStudies
member.summary: This action searches for DICOM Studies that match specified search parameters and returns a list of matching studies and the requested attributes for each study.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.SearchForSeries
member.summary: This action searches for DICOM Series that match specified search parameters and returns a list of matching series and the requested attributes for each series.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.SearchForInstances
member.summary: This action searches for DICOM Instances that match specified search parameters and returns a list of matching instances and the requested attributes for each instance.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.SearchForUPS
member.summary: This action searches for UPS Instances known to the Origin-Server. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE C-FIND operation.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.SendEventReport
member.summary: This action sends an Event Report using an open WebSocket connection. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-EVENT-REPORT operation.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.StoreDicom
member.summary: This action stores multipart DICOM SOP Instances and returns HTTP status line, including a status code and associated textual phrase for the entire set of stored SOP Instances, followed by a message body containing the Store Instances Response Module (DICOM PS3.18 2014b - Web Services, 6.6.1.3 Response)

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.StoreDicomXML
member.summary: This action stores multipart DICOM XML metadata or a bulk data items and returns HTTP status line, including a status code and associated textual phrase for the entire set of stored SOP Instances, followed by a message body containing the Store Instances Response Module (DICOM PS3.18 2014b - Web Services, 6.6.1.3 Response)

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.StoreJson
member.summary: This action stores multipart DICOM Json metadata or a bulk data items and returns HTTP status line, including a status code and associated textual phrase for the entire set of stored SOP Instances, followed by a message body containing the Store Instances Response Module (DICOM PS3.18 2014b - Web Services, 6.6.1.3 Response)

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.SuspendGlobalSubscription
member.summary: This action suspends an existing subscription to the Global Worklist managed by the Origin-Server. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-ACTION operation "Suspend Global Subscription".

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCactionType.UpdateUPS
member.summary: This action sets the attributes of a UPS Instance managed by the Origin-Server. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-SET operation.

member.name: T:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCmetaHandler
member.summary: class is used to parse Multipart Message Body of STORE-RS and NPI-RS Store requests, containing XML/JSON Metadata and Bulk Data Request Message Body. The details of HTTP Message Body structure are given in DICOM PS3.18 2017c - Web Services​. 6.6.1 STOW-RS Store Instances​ and 6.10.3.3 Store Transaction

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCmetaHandler.bulkDataHandler
member.summary: interface instance used to associate Meta Data and Bulk Data based on unique BulkDataURI

member.name: M:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCmetaHandler.GetMessages(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Net.Http.HttpContent})
member.summary: Parses the of Request Message Body consisting of XML/JSON Metadata and Bulk Data

member.name: M:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCmetaHandler.provideData(Mergecom.MCattributeSet,System.UInt32,Mergecom.MCvr,System.String)
member.summary: Implement interface method. Implementation should provide data for received BulkDataURI from parsing XML native or JSON metadata by returning an array of data according to the VR type. If the implementation returns null, the incoming attribute will contain a ValueLength of 0 (i.e. attribute in message but zero value length).
member.param: Identifies the current data set in process
member.returns: Array of data according to VR type

member.name: M:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCmetaHandler.provideUri(Mergecom.MCattributeSet,System.UInt32,Mergecom.MCvr)
member.summary: This method will be called when generating XML native or JSON stream for the following vr: FL, FD, IS, LT, OB, OL, OD, OF, OW, SL, SS, ST, UL, UN, US, or UT. Implementation should return a URI location if it desires to send URI instead of the bulk data. If the return value is null or empty string, the original data will be send.
member.param: Identifies the current data set in process
member.returns: URI string to be send in XML or JSON object

member.name: T:Mergecomws.Dicom.IMCbulkDataHandler
member.summary: interface used to provide the bulk data associated with the unique BulkDataUri for given DICOM attribute

member.name: M:Mergecomws.Dicom.IMCbulkDataHandler.provideData(Mergecom.MCattributeSet,System.UInt32,Mergecom.MCvr,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: IMCbulkDataHandler is an extension of . The interface implementation should provide the data by returning an array of data according to the VR type (either by retrieving the data from the URI location or from the data associated with URI) If implementation returns null, the incoming attribute will contain a ValueLength of 0 (i.e. attribute in message but zero value length).
member.param: Identifies the current data set in process
The data associated with the received bulk data URI
member.returns: The data according to VR type

member.summary: Failure A700: Refused: Out of Resources

member.summary: Failure A701: Out of Resources - Unable to calculate number of matches

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_A702
member.summary: Failure A702: Refused: Out of Resources - Unable to perform sub-operations

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_A900
member.summary: Failure A900: Identifier Does Not Match SOP Class

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C300
member.summary: Failure C300: The UPS may no longer be updated

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C301
member.summary: Failure C301: Refused: The correct Transaction UID was not provided

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C302
member.summary: Failure C302: Refused: The UPS is already IN PROGRESS

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C303
member.summary: Failure C303: Refused: The UPS may only become SCHEDULED via N-CREATE, not N-SET or N-ACTION

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C304
member.summary: Failure C304: Refused: The UPS has not met final state requirements for the requested state change

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C307
member.summary: Failure C307: Specified SOP Instance UID does not exist or is not a UPS Instance managed by this SCP

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C308
member.summary: Failure C308: Receiving AE-TITLE is Unknown to this SCP

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C309
member.summary: Failure C309: Refused: The provided value of UPS State was not SCHEDULED

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C310
member.summary: Failure C310: Refused: The UPS is not yet in the IN PROGRESS state

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C311
member.summary: Failure C311: Refused: The UPS is already COMPLETED

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C312
member.summary: Failure C312: Refused: The performer cannot be contacted

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C313
member.summary: Failure C313: Refused: Performer chooses not to cancel

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C314
member.summary: Failure C314: Refused: Specified action not appropriate for specified instance

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.FAILURE_C315
member.summary: Failure C315: Refused: SCP does not support Event Reports

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.PENDING_FF00
member.summary: Pending FF00: Matches are continuing. Current Match is supplied and any Optional Keys were supported in the same manner as Required Keys

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCupsResponse.Status.PENDING_FF01

member.summary: Warning 0001: Requested optional Attributes are not supported

member.summary: Encapsulates and converts WADO-WS DICOM service response into data

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0001
member.summary: Unable to anonymize the requested instance(s).

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0002
member.summary: Web Server does not support anonymization.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0003
member.summary: The requested instance(s) are not immediately available, but can be made available by manual request.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0004
member.summary: Instance is no longer available, e.g., document retention rules have caused it to be removed or relocated.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0005
member.summary: The requested instance(s) cannot be returned because the size or count exceeds resource limits.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0006
member.summary: Web Server does not support the requested format or transfer syntax.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0007
member.summary: The requested instance(s) cannot be provided in the requested format or transfer syntax.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0008
member.summary: Single image format is not available for multi-frame images.

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0009
member.summary: Identifier does not match SOP Class (see PS3.7 C-MOVE).

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0010
member.summary: Inconsistent identifiers, e.g., Study and Series are correct but Series is in a different Study (see PS3.7 C-MOVE).

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0011
member.summary: SOP Class not supported (see PS3.7 C-MOVE).

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0012
member.summary: Invalid parameter value in request (see PS3.7 C-MOVE).

member.name: F:Mergecomws.Dicom.MCwadoWsResponse.Error.WADO_0013
member.summary: Unsupported parameter in request (see PS3.7 C-MOVE).

member.name: M:Mergecomws.Util.MCutil.StreamWriterUtf8.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.param: The complete file path to write to. path can be a file name.

Determines whether data is to be appended to the file. If the file exists and append is false, the file is overwritten. If the file exists and append is true, the data is appended to the file. Otherwise, a new file is created.
